aircraft.value: Shadow Hunter - AC-8065-745 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Reservoir fluid level sensor failure. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 29/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 02/07/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 30/06/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 02/07/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 09/07/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni
